title: The Making of The African Queen Or How I went to Africa with Bogart, Bacall and Huston and almost lost my mind
description: This book will tell youWhat it was like for me to meetJohn Huston, Humphrey Bogart and Lauren BacallIn London and in AfricaFor the first time.To work with them nonstop for about three months. And why —Come hell or high waterThrough thick and through thinFor better and for worseBut not quite until death did we part —It was great fun. — K. H.
author: Katharine Hepburn
